title: Frozen Pool Party Bundle change
body:
As a frequent Malzahar player and not so frequent sej/ori player, i'd rather not spend money on skins and champions I don't need or use. Could you have the skins avalible in separate sales? I've been awaiting a while to buy Snow day Malz since I missed the last snowdown and I was really disappointed to see you had to buy him with the bundle.
Thanks

replies.body:
Hey fknown,

Unfortunately the only way to obtain the skin for now is via the Frozen Pool Party Bundle. D:
They will be available separately next Christmas (and every Christmas), probably, like how any other Snowdown/Christmas skin is usually sold again every Snowdown.
